title: Manhattan Heat
description: Could your whole life change in twenty-four hours?Bennett St. Simon was about to find out...One step in the wrong direction and the poor little rich girl stumbled upon a murder scene - and into the arms of a man who looked guilty as sin. Another step, and Memphis Modine whisked her away...from haute couture into Hell's Kitchen.Bennett had longed for something to shatter her privileged yet humdrum existence. Her abductor definitely fit the bill. Memphis was dark, dangerous - and possibly deadly. But he made her pulse race and her heart beat faster...
author: Alice Orr
